visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly temperature data with the series name 'Temperature'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and include other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins for better spacing. The x-axis displays months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius with similarly styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly temperature data with the series name 'Temperature' and a custom color of tomato red (#FF6347). The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px. Overall, the chart is designed to be visually appealing and informative.
